mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM cms_activity_order cao LEFT JOIN cms_activity a on a.activity_id= cao.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN cms_activity_venue_relevance r on a.activity_id=r.activity_id LEFT JOIN cms_venue v on v.venue_id=r.venue_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on a.activity_create_user=u.user_id LEFT JOIN cms_activity_event cae on cao.event_id = cae.event_id and cae.activity_id = cao.activity_id where 1=1 and cao.ORDER_IS_VALID != 3
AND a.ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ca.activity_name as activityName, ca.activity_id as activiyId, cao.ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID as activityOrderId, cao.ORDER_VOTES as orderVotes, cao.ACTIVITY_START_TIME as activityStartTime, cao.user_id as userId from cms_activity_order cao JOIN cms_activity ca on cao.activity_id = ca.activity_id AND ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID = #{activityOrderId}

SELECT cao.ORDER_PHONE_NO FROM cms_activity_order cao WHERE 1=1
AND cao.ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID = #{activityOrderId}

SELECT a.ACTIVITY_ID, a.ACTIVITY_NAME, a.ACTIVITY_LINKMAN, a.ACTIVITY_TEL, a.ACTIVITY_IS_FREE, a.ACTIVITY_PRICE, a.ACTIVITY_START_TIME, a.ACTIVITY_END_TIME, a.ACTIVITY_IS_DEL, a.ACTIVITY_STATE, a.ACTIVITY_CREATE_TIME, a.ACTIVITY_UPDATE_TIME, a.ACTIVITY_CREATE_USER, a.ACTIVITY_UPDATE_USER, a.ACTIVITY_ADDRESS, a.create_activity_code, v.venue_Name AS venueName, a.ACTIVITY_SALES_ONLINE, a.ACTIVITY_AREA, o.order_number AS order_number, o.order_votes AS order_votes, o.order_pay_status AS orderPayStatus, o.ORDER_NAME AS order_name, o.activity_order_id as activityOrderId, m.user_account, e.EVENT_DATE as eventDate,e.EVENT_TIME as eventTime, o.ORDER_SUMMARY, o.order_Phone_No, o.order_Validate_Code FROM cms_activity_order o LEFT JOIN cms_activity a ON o.ACTIVITY_ID = a.activity_id LEFT JOIN cms_activity_venue_relevance r ON a.activity_id = r.activity_id LEFT JOIN cms_venue v ON v.venue_id = r.venue_id LEFT JOIN cms_terminal_user u ON o.user_id = u.user_id left join sys_user m on o.sys_user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN cms_activity_event e ON e.ACTIVITY_ID = o.ACTIVITY_ID and e.EVENT_ID = o.EVENT_ID where 1=1 AND ACTIVITY_ORDER_ID = #{activityOrderId}
